author: Special Correspondent
text:
For attempting to murder the girl he loved

The Mahila Court on Wednesday sentenced a youth to undergo life imprisonment for attempting to murder a girl with he loved.

Mohanraj (19) of Ammapettai had stabbed 18-year-old Sahithya during January 2015 since the latter had spurned his love.

Mohanraj was sentenced to 10 years imprisonment for forceful entry into the girl's house, and awarded life sentence for attempt to murder by the Mahila Court Judge Thirunavakarasu.

Under both counts, he was asked to pay fine of Rs. 5,000 separately.
title: Youth sentenced to life
